Articles.Content:
Arr, this thread be dedicated to pirate talk, say anything ye want, but mi thinks that ye will do that anyway!

also make sure to go by thee forum book of rules!

ARR!

please read:


This thread is not to be considered to have "perfect" english. This thread is meant to have user's try to talk like pirates (sailors who stole stuff from others).
This thread is meant to be comical, and should not be taken seriously.

Questo thread non ÃƒÂ¨ da considerarsi di avere "perfetto" inglese. Questo thread ÃƒÂ¨ pensato per avere prova di utente a parlare come i pirati (marinai che hanno rubato roba dagli altri).

If you are a little kid in school, and has no idea what english is, do not take this thread seriously and don't try to write like in the text of this thread. people will laugh at it and think that you're just trying to be funny. 
this also goes for: kerbonauts, dogs, cats, monkeys, devices that can run under 1.5 volts, space cores, zebras, blob fish, apples, watermelons, firetrucks, crazy self-aware AI's, fish, bacteria, pun making cat lawyers and dog accountants, ect.

[SIZE=3]worries regarding rule 2.4: Language, placement spelling and grammar:[/SIZE]
"All messages must be sent in English unless otherwise indicated. The user should make an effort to place a new thread in the right forum section and must attempt to use proper grammar and spelling in all messages, meaning that txt-speak, 1337-speak and other exclusionary jargons are prohibited."

I know few of you people reading this have noticed this rule, and I've been sort-of worried about it.
however, here's a few things why I believe that it is not in violation to the forum rules:
1. we are talking in understandable english, with some piratey variations of words.
It is not what is called "engrish" although some people will go above and beyond and go into full pirate talk overdrive, which will become almost completely confusing.
those posts shall not become representative of this thread

2. this place (what I think) is in the right forum section.

[SIZE=3]Note to moderators:[/SIZE]
If you find this thread to be in violation of rule 2.4, just go ahead and lock it, or delete it all together. 
I and other people wouldn't really care if this thread goes away, as it was just for fun. 
However, I would like this thread to be enjoyed for a little while longer, as it will eventually become forgotten in the thousands of forum threads in the space lounge


"My spaceship is a carrot" 
if you've actually read this, you should get candy. However if you want a challenge, try to get the reference from the quote above this sentence.

ALSO: banana's ARE the nerdiest fruit. Do not question it, as scott manley said it

Edited June 5, 2014 by gooddog15

ARRR!

to you too!
Me thinks thars an echo
An echo? AR. Whar she be?
That echo be the voice of a KRAKEN!!!!!!!
How do you do? Allow me to introduce myself; I work for Goldman-Sachs.

Aye, that name be of the devil!

Ye landluber is looting me booty.

Arr

Aye, ye be right scurvy dog. Goldman-Sachs be the name o' the screamin' banshee that haunts all the boats who hear her screams. Ye oughta be throwin' Vanamonde off the boat, he be a landlubber tryin'a steal yer booty. I've heard tales of many a sailor bein' tricked by the Vanamonde into handin' over they booty, sayin' that they be good mates or that they be drawing the swords if they don't get the booty. Vanamonde be a stinky landlubber with nothin' better to do than stay in 'is great big shack of a house watchin' the flame go out. If the Vanamonde be tellin' you of these tales, fire yer cannon at 'is dumb, banshee-lovin, landlubber hide, and he be runnin' away faster 'en the Maria at full wind!

Edited May 27, 2014 by Flymetothemun

Arr, I concur. Them scurvy bildrats are suing mi booty after I took they're captains yacht on a joyride. Aye be being found guilty of 4 counts of grand theft boating, and 2 counts of drinkin & sailing. That really made that old cranky seapig mad as a raging Poseidon. Anyway aye need to be gettin to ye anti scurvy machine pronto. And maybe mi bed for a goodnights rest

Edited May 27, 2014 by gooddog15

Arrr! Isn't this thread against rule 2.4?

2.4 Language, placement spelling and grammar

All messages must be sent in English unless otherwise indicated. The user should make an effort to place a new thread in the right forum section and must attempt to use proper grammar and spelling in all messages, meaning that txt-speak, 1337-speak and other exclusionary jargons are prohibited.

Arr, me thinks not. we be saying in legible english, be in the right forum sea and not be speaking in another language. Also me knows that thee grammar rule is disobeyed alot. If we be in violation, we would be plundered by vandamonte and others, yarr
Aye, ye be followin' the pirate grammar straight n' true! Ye don't be needin' t' use the king's english! Use whatever english ye feel like usin'!

Yarr, we shall plunder his booty, har-de-har-har. If that rule be true, then thee talk in kerbal language threads would be under a storm right now, yarr

Now I have a joke to tell ye, what is a pirates favorite letter?

Edited May 27, 2014 by gooddog15

Yarr, it must be a good thread or else Vanmonde would've plundered us.

Aye Laddy, I've seen many "talk in" threads be plundered. Yarr!
Yarr, we shall become one of thee best talk in threads to ever sail the seven seas! Anyway, were be me treasured booty?!

Aye, I be thinkin' it be stolen by Modbeard himself! Ye better be loadin' up yer ship with a full load o' powder and balls, Modbeard be the toughest pirate in all the seven seas! I heard from a matey in Britain that he sunk over 500 ships in one year!
Arr, me be not afraid of this seapig, for i have a secret weapon: Jeb

I'll cut ya from stem to stern with a rusty cutlass for pondering such a subject.Didn't that sea witch that berthed ya teach ya no a thing ? from Just John-navigator,instigator and sometimes procrastinator.

How do you do? Allow me to introduce myself; I work for Goldman-Sachs.

That made me laugh far too much for sitting at my desk at work

*sick* *shrug* *yawn*

Thoose rules are versatiles @ all levels even more than we could ever be able to suspect so *shrug*

EDIT:

Arrr! Isn't this thread against rule 2.4?

ARR! weve been discussing that, but look at thee top of page 2, thar ye find how me brothers aren't in violation

Edited May 30, 2014 by gooddog15
Arr, what do ye think of my new ship mateys? freshly stolen from the kerbal navy!
Avast waxaa jira kabtanka!
Avast! I must sail the bumpy seas of grey pavement, so I cannot challenge that wonderful boat. Yerr be sure to be in for a battle, ARR!
Aye, I would attack yer boat but me boat keeps exploding. Yarr, don't be underestimate the power of the kracken!
